name: Yarrrtillery
description:
This bathtub isn't big enough for two fierce crews of toy pirates. Use your "yarrrtillery" to sink the other pirate's ship.

Shoot at the opponent's targets to damage their ship. A ship will take in some water every round for each target that is down, so make sure to repair your targets if they get hit.

Move with WASD or by holding and dragging on the screen.

Interact with cannons and targets by pressing E or hitting the on-screen button.

Modes: Multiplayer online:

Click "Host" and send the code to a friend. The friend hits "Join" and enters the code.

This mode is currently broken. We hope to find a solution within a day or two.

Hot Seat:

Old school Hot Seat action!

Single player:

Get your aiming perfected before you challenge your nemesis.

Bastis - Music and Game Programming

Bei - Server code, SFX, UI

CaptainRipley - Models and Animations
